prompt: Create a comprehensive user role management interface with a clean, professional design. The page should feature a top app bar with the title 'User Role Management' and a settings icon. Below the header, implement a search functionality with a rounded search field that includes a magnifying glass icon and placeholder text 'Search users by name or email'. The main content area should display user cards in a scrollable list format. Each user card should contain a circular avatar image on the left, followed by the user's name in bold text, their email address in smaller gray text below the name, and their current role displayed as a colored badge on the right side of the card. Include role badges for 'Admin' (red background), 'Editor' (blue background), and 'Viewer' (green background) with white text. At the bottom of each card, add an 'Edit Role' button with primary color styling. The overall layout should use a white background with subtle shadows on the cards for depth, and maintain consistent spacing and typography throughout.
